alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 6:38AM MDT until November 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest wind 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Localized wind gusts to 80 mph over ridge tops, and on the south side of Casper. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...Now until 9 PM MDT this evening. The most widespread, very strong winds will occur between 10 AM and 4 PM today. At 612 AM, an 81 mph wind gust was observed on the south side of Casper. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation, particularly along Wyoming Boulevard on the south side of Casper. Extreme blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In a parking lot, park into the wind to minimize the possibility of your car door hitting another parked vehicle.
info.instruction: Use caution if you drive, and keep both hands on the steering wheel in case of a sudden strong wind gust.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
